data.title: Italian Restaurant in New York, NY
data.meta_description: Located on New York’s famed Restaurant Row in the heart of the theater district, Becco is open 7 days a week for both lunch & dinner. Becco is most famous for its’ innovative pasta tasting menu & extensive $25 wine list.
data.meta_site_name: Becco | Italian Restaurant in New York, NY
